Reviews.Title: Great Starter Kit!
Reviews.Author: icebreakr1
Reviews.Content: Majority of the kit still survives today apart from the cheapo tripod and the memory card but it still does the job pretty well. Never had a problem and i don't think I would either

Reviews.Title: Poor exposure
Reviews.Author: Janet M. Kroll
Reviews.Content: Nice light camera but, .... Does not have a good clean exposure, very artificial looking. Will be returning this and buy a canon, you just can't bet the quality of a Canon for the price.  If you want sharp photos this is not the camera.
